title: Oriapi
description: Oriapi is the backbone of Oribiky's bike rental service. I've worked on architecting and implementing a refactored version of the API that aims for performance and reliability while including many new features. My contribution has reduced the client's expenses and increased the overall performance.

title: Oridash
description: Oridash is a control panel for Oribiky's bike rental service. I've worked on building it with performance and interactivity in mind. The final result has presented the client with a rich experience and meaningful information.
